original_text: Israel will be like a field of grain in Rephaim valley after the harvest. The workers have cut down the crops. They have picked up the grain from the ground.
korean_text: 마치 추수하는 자가 곡식을 거두어 가지고 그의 손으로 이삭을 벤 것 같고 르바임 골짜기에서 이삭을 주운 것 같으리라

sentences.original_text: Israel will be like a field of grain in Rephaim valley
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘은 르바임 골짜기의 곡식 밭과 같을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The workers have cut down the crops
They have picked up the grain from the ground
